agents.monitor

Class MonitorAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • agents.MetaAgent
      • agents.Portal
        • agents.monitor.MonitorAgent

  • public class MonitorAgent
extends Portal
    A portal wrapper that intercepts and logs / copies / exports messages received. Messages intercepted via this MonitorAgent can be exported to other classes outside of the agent system.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class agents.MetaAgent

        name

      Overrides the execution of a message on a sub-agent.

    • Method Detail

      • executeOnSubAgent

        protected void executeOnSubAgent(java.lang.String agent,
                                 Message message)
        Overrides the execution of a message on a sub-agent. Implements same behaviour as parent except the interception of messages meant for direct children of this agent.
        Overrides:
        executeOnSubAgent in class Portal
        Parameters:
        agent - The name of the sub-agent.
        message - The message intended for it this agent.

      • log

        protected void log(MetaAgent target,
                   Message message)
        Logs that the given message has been intercepted heading towards the given target.
        Parameters:
        target - The target that the message is intended to be for.
        message - The message that has been intercepted.
